name: Brawldocku
description:
Tactical dueling game infused with powers of gods and sudoku. Play cards secretly, use powerful skills and overcome your opponents in the most competitive sudoky game ever existed.

  • Number of players: 2 
  • Playtime: 30-60 minutes.

You will need 20 pages of A4 in total to print the game files. Print on both sides, except for the board - this one is one-sided.
